name: Thundercloud Racing
description:
Save residents from drought!

Prototype # 4 / 8

General Information:

  • Genre: racing
  • Unusual game mechanics:  watering many small objects during a time trial

Play as a cloud and water the beds to grow crops.

  • Lightning: adds speed
  • Crystal: adds time
  • Cloud: adds size
  • Thundercloud: adds size and speed
  • UFO: takes away size and speed

Controls:

  • W, D - Movement
